title: I am not interested in technology or mathematics. Should I get into computer science? - Quora
tags: Career Advice and Computer Science Education

response.answer_text: If you are not interested in a particular branch, don’t go for it just because of placements or peer pressure. Listen to your heart and mind and decide for yourself. CSE is not everything. There are many more jobs in this world. You can do research also if you are interested in that. At the end of the day it’s your decision to make. You can succeed in whatever branch you take if you put your heart, mind and soul into it.
no….you should not get into cs …..because jobs after cs are tech based … so i suggest you to not go for cs then ….
